21  from __future__ import division 
22  from splines import Spline, UnivariateSpline, PartialInputSpline 
23  import numpy as np 
24  from imusim.maths import vectors 
25  from itertools import izip 

26   
27 -class UnivariateVectorSpline(Spline): 

28      """ 
29      Model of a vector function of a single variable using spline fitting. 
30   
31      The implementation uses an independent L{UnivariateSpline} for each 
32      component of the vector function. 
33      """ 

34 -    def __init__(self, x, y, **kwargs): 

35          """ 
36          Construct vector spline. 
37   
38          @param x: Length N, monotonically increasing sequence of input values. 
39          @param y: MxN L{np.ndarray} of output values. 
40          @param kwargs: Additional parameters passed to L{UnivariateSpline}. 
41          """ 
42          self.splines = [UnivariateSpline(x, yi, **kwargs) for yi in y] 

43   

44 -    def __call__(self,x,n=0): 

45          """ 
46          Evaluate the n-th derivative of the function at input value(s) x. 
47          """ 
48          return np.vstack([s(x, n) for s in self.splines]) 

49   
50      @property 

51 -    def validFrom(self): 

52          return max([s.validFrom for s in self.splines]) 

53   
54      @property 

55 -    def validTo(self): 

56          return min([s.validTo for s in self.splines]) 

57   

58 -class PartialInputVectorSpline(PartialInputSpline): 

59      """ 
60      Piecewise vector spline allowing for undefined regions in output domain. 
61      """ 
62      _splineClass = UnivariateVectorSpline 
63   

64 -    def __init__(self, x, y, **kwargs): 

65          PartialInputSpline.__init__(self, x, y, **kwargs) 
66          self._dims = np.shape(y)[0] 

67   

68 -    def _validity(self, y): 

69          return vectors.validity(y) 

70   

71 -    def _output(self, x, conditions, results, undefined): 

72          out = np.empty((self._dims, len(np.atleast_1d(x)))) 
73          for cond, result in izip(conditions, results): 
74              out[:,cond] = result 
75          out[:,undefined] = np.nan 
76          return out
